snippet: Fights between goaltenders and modifying the overtime format will be on the agenda when the N.H.L.’s general managers reconvene in Florida in the spring.
abstract: NHL Roundup; NHL general managers agree to address fights between goaltenders and modifying the overtime format when they reconvene in Florida in March; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Fights between goaltenders and modifying the overtime format will be on the agenda when the N.H.L.’s general managers reconvene in Florida in the spring.
